eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu

Class SkillMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu.SkillMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WauzInventory

    public class SkillMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements WauzInventory
    An inventory that can be used as menu or for other custom interaction mechanics. Sub menu of the main menu, that is used for viewing passive skills and spending statpoints.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public static void open(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Opens the menu for the given player. Lists all passive skills, to spent points in, aswell as weapon skill stats.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should view the inventory.
        See Also:
        PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.getHealth(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.getTrading(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.getLuck(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.getMana(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.getStrength(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.getAgility(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.getStaffSkill(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.getAxeSkill(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.getSwordSkill(Player), MenuUtils.setBorders(Inventory)

      • selectMenuPoint

        public void selectMenuPoint(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
        Checks if an event in this inventory was triggered by a player click. Cancels the event and adds a point to the selected skill, if any statpoints are left.
        Specified by:
        selectMenuPoint in interface WauzInventory
        Parameters:
        event - The inventory click event.
        See Also:
        PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.getTotalStatpoints(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.getSpentStatpoints(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.increaseHealth(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.increaseTrading(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.increaseLuck(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.increaseMana(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.increaseStrength(Player), PlayerPassiveSkillConfigurator.increaseAgility(Player)
